entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as smiling and making a cut in his arm to heal it instantly.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being kind and having blood worth more than Dumbledore's.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as healing Malfoy's wounds.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as having his wounds healed by Snape.

entities.name: rock face
entities.description: The rock face is peppered with dark, glistening drops after Dumbledore's cut.

relationships.description: Dumbledore says Harry's blood is worth more than his own.
